page.title: 04TRANSPORT & BUS SERVICES
page.content:
The area is poorly served by public transport. The Combe Martin/Barnstaple bus runs from C M via A399 to Easterclose where it turns off onto B3229. There is one bus each way on Tuesdays and Fridays.
In the summer there is an additional Coastal bus which runs from Ilfracombe to Lynton/Lynmouth via the A399. A local coach firm runs many coach trips along the route and onto Exmoor during the season.
Most of the houses are a considerable distance from a bus stop and also from the village shops and Post Offices at Kentisbury and Parracombe so a car would seem to be a necessity except for the very active.
